name: Mini Me
description:
Info

Mini Me is a top-down Wave Defense game with a twist. You are you best friend. (Yeah i know sounds pretty sad) but, you have a little version of yourself aka your Mini Me!

Controls

WASD to Move

Shift + Movement to Dash

& Q to bring up the Shop

Credits

datagoblin - the Monogram & Monogram Extended Font
FartFish - the dungeon tileset
